com.ethercis.servicemanager.common

Class DayPlanner

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ethercis.servicemanager.common.DayPlanner

  • public class DayPlanner
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class to map events and activations in a Day

    The day plan consists of a bit map with a 1' resolution. That is, a day plan is held into a bitmap of size 1440 (24*60). The mask is set by setting to true a single time or a range.

                                                                com.ethercis.ehrserver.definitions.x10.WeekPlan p)
        returns the Day of Week object in WeekPlan for a day index

        parameter dow follows the day indexing scheme of Calendar.

        Parameters:
        dow - day index
        p - WeekPlan to get the DoW from
        Returns:
        DoW definition or null if none
        See Also:

      • setDayPlanner

        public DayPlanner setDayPlanner(java.util.Calendar starttime,
                                java.util.Calendar stoptime)
        set a DayPlanner bitmap

        The time range is set according to the following rules:

        • if both start and stop time are supplied, set the range accordingly
        • if start time is undef (null) assume this is 0:00
        • if stop time is undef (null) assume this is 23:59
          Parameters:
          starttime - the start time of the range to set
          stoptime - the stop time of the range to set

          The a ponctual time

          Parameters:
          starttime - the start time of the range to set
